name: Dexodonex
description: Hexagonal puzzle with the ability to edit levels
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon X1800 GTO 256MB and the Nvidia GeForce 6800 Ultra 256MB cards, or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Sound blaster
